attributes.action: Vote to have Farringdon Street renamed  Saint Farringdon Street since it is so holey
attributes.additional_details:
I appeal to the transport department to rename Farringdon Street near the City of London to Saint Farringdon Street. Every day I travel down it on my bike, it is a miracle I don't crash into one of the countless potholes. I give my thanks to God that he is watching over me and so far I have avoided crashing. Because of that I have come to the conclusion that the road is very holey and holy at the same time.

For that reason I propopse the name change.  Peace be with you

rejection.details: This is a matter for the City of London Corporation.
